targets.expr: (sum by (job_name, operator_name) (rate(flink_taskmanager_job_task_operator_rocksdb_block_cache_data_hit{cluster="nexmark-flink", job_name=~"$job"}[1m])) / (sum by (job_name, operator_name) (rate(flink_taskmanager_job_task_operator_rocksdb_block_cache_data_hit{cluster="nexmark-flink", job_name=~"$job"}[1m])) + sum by (job_name, operator_name) (rate(flink_taskmanager_job_task_operator_rocksdb_block_cache_data_miss{cluster="nexmark-flink", job_name=~"$job"}[1m])))) * 100
